## Validators.validateTilesetFile() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Performs a default validation of the given tileset file, and returns a promise to the `ValidationResult`<!-- -->.

The given file may be a `tileset.json` file, or a tileset package file, as incdicated by a `.3tz` or `.3dtiles` file extensions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static validateTilesetFile(filePath: string, validationOptions?: ValidationOptions): Promise<ValidationResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filePath | string | The file path |
|  validationOptions | [ValidationOptions](./3d-tiles-validator.validationoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ The <code>ValidationOptions</code>. When this is not given (or <code>undefined</code>), then default validation options will be used. See [ValidationOptions](./3d-tiles-validator.validationoptions.md)<!-- -->. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[ValidationResult](./3d-tiles-validator.validationresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise to a `ValidationResult` that is fulfilled when the validation finished.
